[[Image:Feastfires Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Feastfires on the continent of Westeros]]
'''Feastfires''' is a castle in [[the Westerlands]], the region controlled by [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. The castle is located on the tip of a peninsula west of Casterly Rock.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/casterly-rock/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Casterly Rock entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Feastfires is the seat of House Prester. It is located close to a town called Kayce.
